thread.title: More staff to work on some railway stations in Essex
thread.title_full: More staff to work on some railway stations in Essex | Anglia - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: More staff to work on some railway stations in Essex
text:
Commuters in parts of Essex should see more rail staff on their journeys from today.
Operator c2c has become the first franchise in the country to staff all its stations all day, from before the first train of the day arrives, until after the final service has departed.
Until now only the busiest c2c stations were staffed on this basis, with ticket offices closing at some smaller stations in the early afternoon.
We are doing this because many passengers have told us they really value having a human presence at the station.
â€“ c2c Managing Director Julian Drury Last updated Mon 28 Sep 2015 Travel Essex
